sqlMap.statement: SELECT DISTINCT RIC.PRNT_BLLG_MSTR_ID FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PROC_CD = #rossIntfcContrProcCd# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RIC.ROSS_INTFC_CONTR_PK FROM ROSS_INTFC_CONTR RIC WHERE RIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RIC.PRNT_BLLG_MSTR_ID = #prntBllgMstrId# AND RIC.ROSS_INTFC_PROC_STS_CD = #rossIntfcProcStsCd# AND RIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
